text: Har Shaakh Pe Ullu Baithaa Hai is an Indian political television series that premiered on 26 February 2018 and airs on Star Plus. The Show stars Rajiv Nigam, Shradha Sharma and Samta Sagar in lead roles. The show is being produced by Garima Productions. ==Cast== *Rajiv Nigam as Chaitu Lal *Samta Sagar as Imli Devi (Chaitu Lal's Wife) *Shradha Sharma as Gainda Devi *Monica Shukla as Nagina Devi *Kashish Khan as Haseena Devi *Melissa Pais as Malai *Poornima Verma as Rajneeti *Alika Nair as Party *Sonam Shekhawat as Ghotali *Riya Rawal as Sarkar *Naitik chudasama as Bahumat *Gyaneshwar Jha as Jha *Monica Rahlan as Monica ==References== http://www.tellydhamaal.com/har-shakh- par-ullu-baitha-hai-on-star-plus-cast-wiki-images-hd-pics-promo-timings/ Category:Drama television series Category:Hindi-language television series Category:2010s Indian television series Category:2018 Indian television series debuts
title: Har Shaakh Pe Ullu Baithaa Hai
